facts.fact_text: Hungary's industrial production increased by 1.8% year-on-year in December 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: Industrial production in Hungary grew by 1.8% year-on-year in December 2025, rebounding from a 5.4% decline in the previous month, according to preliminary estimates.

facts.fact_text: This increase marks the first growth in industrial activity since February 2024.

evidences.evidence_text: This marked the first growth in industrial activity since February 2024, driven by notable increases in production volumes across most of the manufacturing sub-sectors.

facts.fact_text: On a seasonally and working-day adjusted monthly basis, industrial output rose by 0.9% compared with the previous month.

evidences.evidence_text: On a seasonally and working-day adjusted monthly basis, industrial output rose by 0.9% compared with the previous month, recovering from a 2% decrease in November.

facts.fact_text: For the full year of 2025, the volume of industrial production was 3.2% lower than in 2024.

evidences.evidence_text: For the full year of 2025, the volume of industrial production was 3.2% lower than in 2024.

evidence.evidence_text: Industrial production in Hungary grew by 1.8% year-on-year in December 2025
